Job Description

Sales Consultant

Upscale Luxury Retailer looking for part-time portrait sales consultant located in Greenwich CT

A well-established Portrait Artist looking for a dynamic person to consummate the sale of art pieces. Sales to take place either in our studio Candidate must be well versed in home design, and decorating.

Applicant must:

·       Comfortable dealing with the affluent.

·       5 years of sales experience.

·       Professional appearance.

·       Strong communications skills.

·       Have reliable transportation.

·       Detailed oriented.

·       Be able to work Wedensday thru Saturdays.

.


All clients are provided. No Solicitation required. Salary plus commissions and paid benefits Total yearly compensation between $100,000-125,000.

DO NOT CALL THE STUDIO.

MUST SUBMIT COVER LETTER AND RESUME FOR CONSIDERATION

Studio website: www.kramerportraits.com
